name: Fire and Stone
description:
Ludum Dare 41 - Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

This is my entry for ludum dare 41. In this game I have tried to combine turnbased strategy with RPG adventure. Might not be the most incompatible, and it shows, the game is great to play!

You take on the roll as wizard who wields the power of fire. Reach the portal at the end of the level to complete the game. In your way are all kinds of monsters - use your fire magic to defeat them!

Explore the world around you to find keys and unlock new spells!

Controls:

Arrowkeys - Move

Space - Cast spell

1-3 - Switch between active spells

Escape - Quit game
